name: Oc2.316s Cakit File
summary: A VAC file is a data file used by the now-discontinued Oc2.316s Cakit system, a computer algebra toolkit designed for polynomial arithmetic and arbitrary precision integer calculations. VAC files contain a collection of classes and functions the Oc2.316s Cakit system uses to perform complex algebraic operations.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
